price: 98. Ee ku tasbiixso ammaanaha Rabbigaa oo ka mid ahow kuwa u sujuuda24.
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ
footnotes:
24. Ibnu Cabbaas a.k.r. waxaa laga soo weriyey inuu yidhi: Waxaan ku garan jirey bogidda salaadda faralka kor ugu qaadista codka Xusidda Alle sida takbiirta.
(W.w. Al-Bukhaari)

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wakun mina al-sājidīna
